name: Clock Crew Showdown: K-9 VS Octopus
name_original: Clock Crew Showdown: K-9 VS Octopus
description:
"It's a GOSHDARNED shootout.

As K-9:

Press A to shoot.

As Octopus:

Press L to shoot."

This game was released on May 14th 2020 on my Newgrounds account. It had some minor bugs that I fixed up for this release!

You can find the soundtrack here.

Have fun!

-rgen
